perturbation.original_text: For the performance of its services as Remarketing Agent hereunder, the Fund shall pay to the Remarketing Agent in arrears on the first day of each calendar month (or, if such day is not a Business Day, on the next succeeding Business Day) a monthly fee for each MFP Share Outstanding on the first calendar day of the preceding calendar month (or the date hereof in the case of the first such payment), in an amount, rounded upward to the nearest dollar, equal to (a) the product of (i) the rate of compensation as then in effect, as shall be agreed upon from time to time in writing by the Fund and the Remarketing Agent, times $[●] multiplied by (ii) the actual number of days from and including such first calendar day of the preceding calendar month (or the date hereof in the case of the first such payment) to and including the last calendar day of such preceding calendar month or, if applicable, the date of termination of this Agreement, if earlier, or the date of any prior redemption or liquidation for such share (as the case may be), divided by (b) 360. The obligation of the Fund to make the payments required by this Section shall survive the termination of this Agreement and remain in full force and effect until all such payments shall have been made in full.
perturbation.changed_text: For the performance of its services as Remarketing Agent hereunder, the Fund shall pay to the Remarketing Agent in arrears on the first day of each calendar month (or, if such day is not a Business Day, on the next succeeding Business Day) a monthly fee for each MFP Share Outstanding on the first calendar day of the preceding calendar month (or the date hereof in the case of the first such payment), in an amount, rounded upward to the nearest dollar, equal to (a) the product of (i) the rate of compensation as then in effect, as shall be agreed upon from time to time in writing by the Fund and the Remarketing Agent, times $[●] multiplied by (ii) the actual number of days from and including such first calendar day of the preceding calendar month (or the date hereof in the case of the first such payment) to and including the last calendar day of such preceding calendar month or, if applicable, the date of termination of this Agreement, if earlier, or the date of any prior redemption or liquidation for such share (as the case may be), divided by (b) 360. The obligation of the Fund to make the payments required by this Section shall terminate immediately upon the termination of this agreement, nullifying any further payment obligations.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the payment obligations upon termination. Initially, the contract states that the payment obligation survives termination. The modified text states that the payment obligation terminates immediately, creating uncertainty about whether the Fund must continue payments after the agreement ends. This discrepancy could lead to disputes over payment responsibilities.

perturbation.original_text: The Remarketing Agent may resign and be discharged from its duties and obligations hereunder with respect to the VRRM-MFP Shares by giving 90 days' prior written notice to the Fund and the Calculation and Paying Agent.
perturbation.changed_text: The Remarketing Agent may resign and be discharged from its duties and obligations hereunder with respect to the VRRM-MFP Shares by giving 90 days' prior written notice to the Fund and the Calculation and Paying Agent. Alternatively, the Remarketing Agent can resign immediately by paying a penalty of $10,000 to the Fund.
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces a contradiction by adding an alternative method for the Remarketing Agent to resign: immediate resignation with a penalty. This conflicts with the original clause, which only specifies a 90-day notice period. It creates uncertainty about which resignation procedure applies and whether the Fund can demand the penalty payment instead of the 90-day notice period.

perturbation.original_text: Without the prior written consent of the Remarketing Agent, the Fund will not agree or consent to any amendment, supplement or modification of the Tender and Paying Agent Agreement, this Agreement or the Supplement, nor waive any provision thereof, if such amendment, supplement, modification or waiver would materially adversely affect the interests of the Remarketing Agent, in the Remarketing Agent's sole discretion; provided, that, for purposes of this Section 12, any changes or amendments to the rating agency criteria provided in the Supplement for the VRRM-MFP Shares shall not be deemed to materially adversely affect the interests of the Remarketing Agent.
perturbation.changed_text: Without the prior written consent of the Remarketing Agent, the Fund will not agree or consent to any amendment, supplement or modification of the Tender and Paying Agent Agreement, this Agreement or the Supplement, nor waive any provision thereof, if such amendment, supplement, modification or waiver would materially adversely affect the interests of the Remarketing Agent, in the Fund's sole discretion; provided, that, for purposes of this Section 12, any changes or amendments to the rating agency criteria provided in the Supplement for the VRRM-MFP Shares shall not be deemed to materially adversely affect the interests of the Remarketing Agent.
perturbation.explanation: The introduced change creates a contradiction by stating that the Fund now has the discretion on if a modification would materially affect the interests of the Remarketing Agent. The original text stated that the Remarketing Agent had sole discretion.
